Talk10_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>I'm gonna keep practicing my cooking
until everyone in the village loves it!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>Speaking of which! <sp:5:1:0>Do you want to hear
about what I've learned so far?
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Look, mister, look! The blizzard stopped,
and the sky cleared up!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>This will definitely for sure make Mama
and everyone else in the village happy!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Think>Things are really tough in the village right
now because of the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>That's why I'm learning how to make food!
Everyone feels better after a yummy meal.<sp:0:4:0>Every day I take a look at the recipe book
and try something new. It's going great!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>It's getting late today. I'll go back to the
cookbook tomorrow.
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Hey, mister. Didja know there's a recipe
book at the Slippery Falcon?<sp:0:4:0>I look at it every day to learn how to be
a good cook!
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Do you need something, mister? I've got
my hands a little full now.<sp:0:4:0>I'd love to chat, but I'm on my way to the
kitchen so I can try out a new recipe!
Talk51:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Yoo-hoo, mister! <sp:5:1:0>Do you want to hear
what I've learned about cooking so far?
Talk52:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Yoo-hoo! <sp:5:1:0>Do you want to hear what I've
learned about cooking again?
Talk54: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Remember how I tried to make a fish pie?
Talk55:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I used <clr:0000>Tabantha wheat<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>goat butter<clr:ffff>
as the basis for the dough.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>It turns out you can make all sorts of pies
depending on what you add to that!<sp:0:4:0>If you add fruit and cane sugar, you'll
make a <clr:0000>fruit pie<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>Meat and rock salt make
a <clr:0000>meat pie<clr:ffff>. You get the idea!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Thank you for the fish, mister! I'm gonna
make a real yummy meal with it!
Talk56:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_01>If you add <clr:0000>goat butter<clr:ffff> to <clr:0000>Tabantha wheat<clr:ffff>
and <clr:0000>cane sugar<clr:ffff>, <sp:5:0:0>you can bake a cake.<sp:0:4:0>If you mix in a tree nut on top, you get
a <clr:0000>nutcake<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>Or you could use a carrot
instead for a <clr:0000>carrot cake<clr:ffff>!
Talk57:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You should definitely try out some of this
stuff for yourself!
